abstract: The celebrated value investor Warren E. Buffett ultimately did not raise his bid to top IntercontinentalExchange’s $8.2 billion proposal.
snippet: The celebrated value investor Warren E. Buffett ultimately did not raise his bid to top IntercontinentalExchange’s $8.2 billion proposal.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett has built one of the world’s great fortunes looking for companies undervalued by the markets. For a short while, it appears, he considered the New York Stock Exchange’s parent company one of those potential deal targets.

headline.main: Buffett Said to Have Weighed Deal for NYSE Euronext
headline.print_headline: Buffett Said to Have Weighed NYSE Euronext

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
